text: Bailleul-aux-Cornailles is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de-France region of France. ==Geography== A farming village located 18 miles (28 km) northeast of Arras at the junction of the N39 and D83 roads. ==Population== ==Sights== * The church of St. Pierre, dating from the fifteenth century. * The ancient priory of Bailleulet. ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Bailleul-aux-Cornailles
